summary: After having been run out of New York City's Chinatown, brothel owner Madame Olga moves her ring of prostitutes and criminals to a deserted ore mine and starts over.
cast: Audrey Campbell|Judy Young|W.B. Parker|Ella Daphni|Alice Denham|Brenda Denaut|Josel|Connie Oliver|Angel Aintree|Robin|Susan Small|Gil Adams|Jackie Miller|Joel Holt
keywords: bound and gagged|abandoned mine|mine shaft|tied to a chair|tied to a tree
title: Olga's House of Shame
